entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: S 20 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
